TopicTitle: I have three active flights but nothing in the tracking station

Articles.Content: Self explanatory, my save file before I launch it says I have three active flights despite none appearing in the tracking station. What do? I am playing on science mode, and this KSP program is unmodded.

They most likely are being hidden by filters.

In the tracking station: move your mouse up to the top of the screen, and click on the various icons. One of them probably has a 3 by it.
